Louisville_Jefferson_County.James Russell Lowell Elementary School (: James Russell Lowell Elementary School (Louisville, Kentucky) was located at 4501 Crittenden Drive in an area known as Highland Park, Louisville. Construction began in 1916 on the original portion of the building that was known as Highland Park School and had the only remaining bell tower on a Public School in Louisville, Kentucky. Subsequent construction began in 1931 and the school became known as Lowell.
